name: Millitaur
description: The Millitaur combines the traits of a bull and humanoid, wielding a handaxe and exhibiting strong physical attributes.
memorable: Its ability to throw poisonous concoctions and heal allies makes it a unique combatant.
goals: To support its allies and engage in battle effectively.
relations: Often found in groups with other combat-focused creatures.
environment: Typically located in rugged terrains or battlefields.
strengths: Resistant to poison and slashing damage, immune to being prone.
weaknesses: Low intelligence limits its effectiveness in social situations.
attacks: Can make two attacks with a handaxe, dealing slashing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Poisonous Flask produces significant area damage and the potential to poison multiple creatures.
senses: Possesses darkvision and tremorsense, allowing it to navigate in darkness.
skills: Skilled in Acrobatics, enabling complex movements in battle.
additional_information: Has a challenge rating of 3, posing an average threat to low-level parties.
Strong Strength and Constitution scores support its melee combat effectiveness.
Can administer a Healing Tonic to allies, healing them and curing diseases.
Excellent burrowing speed helps it navigate terrain advantageously.
The combination of melee attacks and area poison damage grants versatility.
test_queries: large monstrosity that combines bull and humanoid traits
creature with poison flask and healing abilities
bruiser that can heal allies and deal poison damage
combat monster skilled in acrobatics and melee attacks
dual-natured creature with excellent burrowing speed
